SEO_TITILE: Agustin's Portfolio - Web and Mobile Developer
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Hire Agustin to create your web or mobile application. Web and mobile developer specialized in Kotlin, Flutter, and Astro.
INTRO_4th_LINE: Specialized in mobile applications for Android/Kotlin | Flutter/Dart and FullStack Web.
PROJECT_1_DESCRIPTION: I created a Flutter app for a virtual café with login, product list, and a cart. It highlights my skills in intuitive mobile development. Explore and shop with ease!
PROJECT_2_DESCRIPTION: I developed a Flutter app for a chat between registered users. It allows login, view conversations, and send messages. Easily connect with this application!
